The message and tweet by K: Surendran, General Secretary of Kerala BJP, criticizing Kerala CM Pinarayi Vijayan and alleging the brutality of the Kerala police during the Sabarimala protests.
The photograph shared by Surendran showi: which was widely circulated with the claim that the woman was attacked by the Kerala police.
The video footage of the incident: which clearly shows that the woman was hit by a stone on her head and no policeman was seen close to her when she fell to the ground.
Reports from Manorama News and Asianet N: s injury was due to stone-pelting and not the heavy-handedness of the police, as alleged by Surendran.
